channel.title: Help needed: 508 Source
channel.description:
Can someone help me out with this. I've been trying to find a 508 source for quite some time, and no luck.
Would Prefer: Character Customization (Optional, preferred still) Edgeville Home GWD Works Slayer Tower ::item/::pickup command item/command generator (Optional, preferred still) Working PvP. Working Bank.
And if you can, list on how I put in Commands & NPCs, and make them talk... I tried on a 317 server before and never got the hang of it. I'm not sure where I put in the codes (placing in files) for Commands or NPCs.
EPIC Thanks to any & all who can help. :)

item.title: Help needed: 508 Source

@Epic_Ancient wrote:

That didn’t work out. >.<"
